verses.roman:
tomāra 'doṣa' kahite kare nāmera uccāra
'caitanya' 'caitanya' kari' kahe tina-bāra

synonyms: tomāra doṣa—Your fault; kahite—describing; kare—does; nāmera—of the name; uccāra—utterances; caitanya caitanya—Caitanya, Caitanya; kari'-in that way; kahe tina-bāra—he uttered three times.
translation: "While finding fault with You, he uttered Your name three times, saying, 'Caitanya, Caitanya, Caitanya.'
